thread.title: Pentwyn Dynamos Football Club is Pleased to Announce a 2 -Year Shirt Sponsorship Deal for its U13s
thread.title_full: Pentwyn Dynamos Football Club is Pleased to Announce a 2 -Year Shirt Sponsorship Deal for its U13s | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Pentwyn Dynamos Football Club is Pleased to Announce a 2 -Year Shirt Sponsorship Deal for its U13s
text:
(MENAFN Press) 14thJuly 2015 – Cardiff Wales UK – Formed in 1975Pentwyn Dynamos FC from Pentwyn an area in Cardiff the capital city of Wales is proud to announce will sponsor the U13’s team over a 2 year period from the start of the 2015 football season. The unique and fresh design of the away shirts were created by Classic Sportswear also based in the capital.
Pentwyn’s First Team were the South Wales Senior League Division One Champions at the end of the 2000/2001 season supported by various players who came through the ranks. This promotion meant the club would be a Welsh League team from the start of the following season and they have been there ever since.
provides a secure that can protect data for consumers and businesses so that in the unexpected situation of a disaster important information that had been lost will be able to be restored quickly. The process is seamless and extremely cost effective without compromising on security and compliance. 
Malcolm Frazer Founder of Pentwyn Dynamos FC said “Being based in a close community and having been part of the club’s history from day one it is important to continue the development of young kids that come through the door and provide a platform for them to train and participate in competitive matches. We are all looking forward to being associated with Backup Everything for the long term future”.
Vaquar Ahmed CEO of Backup Everythingsaid "We are delighted to be aligned with Pentwyn Dynamos FC and provide necessary funding for the next 2 years of their exciting journey. Grass roots football needs to be supported so that young kids can emulate their footballing heroes and hopefully one day play for their national teams. This is the dream and we want to play a part in supporting the stars of tomorrow”.
About 
A provider of Cloud Backup solutions Backup Everything aims to simplify the offering to backup data for any consumer or business at an affordable cost. Data from Servers PC’s Mac’s Laptops and Mobiles can be backed up offsite and viewed on any browser mobile or tablet device. We aim to keep the message simple to anyone who wants to protect their information and trust with a reputable cloud backup provider. All data is stored in secure DC’s and not accessible by any 3rd parties plus there is no minimum contractual commitment.
